name: striped luchtigen
dieMessage: a striped @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@luchtigen@c-reset@ roars one last time before its brutal death.

attackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ swings its razor sharp and gleaming claws at @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ lets out a fierce growl as it pounces at @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ charges at @player-name@ with its mouth wide open, bearing its fangs!

criticalAttackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ pounces on and tackles @player-name@, and then sinks its teeth directly into @player-name@'s flesh, sending blood @c-bold@@c-red@SPRAYING@c-reset@ across the ground!
The @npc-color-name@ sinks its lengthy claws into @player-name@'s back and tears a large chunk of flesh away!

battleMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ crouches and then pounces directly at @player-name@!

idleMessages.message: A @npc-color-name@ silently stalks its prey in the surrounding grass.
